translations: n.神经科学家：研究神经系统和大脑的科学家。
· Neuroscientists are conducting research on the effects of meditation on the brain.
神经科学家正在研究冥想对大脑的影响。

phrs.translation: 神经科学家, 神经系统科学家
神经科学家们, 认知神经科学家们

sentences.sentence: Other neuroscientists and psychologists have similarly exposed their work.
sentences.translation: 其他神经科学家和心理学家也同样地公开了他们的研究成果。

sentences.sentence: Neuroscientists, on the other hand, armed with brain scans and EEGs, have not been subject to the same degree of critique.
sentences.translation: 另一方面，配有脑部扫描和脑电图的神经科学家却未受到同等的批判。

sentences.sentence: All of these statements can be traced to just a few would-be neuroscientists, especially physician Leonard Sax and therapist Michael Gurian.
sentences.translation: 所有这些说法都可以追溯到少数想成为神经科学家的人，尤其是内科医生伦纳德·萨克斯和治疗师迈克尔·古里安。
